p: By means of hydrodistillation in a Clevenger-type apparatus, 0.3 mL of essential oil was obtained from 1500 g of Frullania brasiliensis, what represents a yield of 0.02% ( v/ w). For the species Herbertus juniperinus, Leptoscyphus hexagonus, and Syzygiella anomala, yields close to 0.01% ( v/ w) were obtained.
